text: Haberfeld is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * David Haberfeld (born 1969), Australian musician and producer * Győző Haberfeld (1889 – c. 1945), Hungarian gymnast * Haim Haberfeld, Israeli trade union and football federation leader * Hanna Zemer, née Haberfeld (1925–2003), Israeli journalist and first female editor-in-chief of a major Israeli newspaper * Mario Haberfeld (born 1976), Brazilian auto racing driver == See also == * Haberfeld Stadium, multi-purpose stadium in Rishon LeZion, Israel
title: Haberfeld
